item.title: Daily Podcast 2026-02-28
item.description: Here's a deep-dive segment on the graphene oxide-protein interaction study: | Graphene oxide has been making waves in biomedical research, but there's been a critical gap in our understanding of how it actually interacts with proteins at the molecular level. | The research team used a combination of molecular dynamics simulations and experimental validation to investigate what happens when proteins encounter graphene oxide surfaces.
item.itunes:author: Eva Dai
item.itunes:summary: Here's a deep-dive segment on the graphene oxide-protein interaction study: | Graphene oxide has been making waves in biomedical research, but there's been a critical gap in our understanding of how it actually interacts with proteins at the molecular level. | The research team used a combination of molecular dynamics simulations and experimental validation to investigate what happens when proteins encounter graphene oxide surfaces.
